Html:
Hello, i wanted to ask if it is possible to hide all the items below my current one.

For example i have a weapon with 1300 dps on the list, i wanted to check a box on top of the list to hide all weapons that are below that weapon so my current one is the lowest and worse one instead of showing another 30 weapons below that. Is it possible to do that right now because i cannot find an option for that :\

The "Direct Upgrades" comparisons chart is close to what you're looking for.  It will only show you things that would be a direct upgrade.

Note, however, that there may be a better weapon out there if you swap your ring or trinket for another one (ie, if your current weapon has +hit on it, and you could swap in a trinket with +hit on it to maintain the hit cap).
